summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to wastewater services of Seattle Public Utilities; amending Subsection 21.28.040 B of the Seattle Municipal Code to adjust the wastewater volume rate; amending Subsection 21.76.040 A of the Seattle Municipal Code to adjust credits to low-income wastewater customers; and adding new Section 21.28.230 to authorize the Director of Seattle Public Utilities to develop and update annually a schedule of wastewater standard charges.
note: Originally referred to the Seattle Public Utilities Committee on 7/26/10
